definition: Hongtong county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He had no ties at all in Hung Tung except his overtaxed pork business.
sentences.chinese: 在洪洞縣除了課稅很重的豬肉生意以外，他一無牽掛。

sentences.english: A couple that were both police officers were found slaughtered in their home in Hongdong county of Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 山西省洪洞縣一對警察夫婦近日在家中遇害。
